'''''Parma Eldalamberon 9''''' is the ninth issue of ''[[Parma Eldalamberon]]'', a journal of linguistic studies of the Elvish languages and names in the works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{PEnav|8|10}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "Frodo fights the Witch-king" — Patrick H. Wynne

* Articles
** "To ''-E'' or ''-NE''?: On the Quenya Past Tense" — [[Tom Loback]]
** "Bird and Leaf: Image and Structure in ''Narqelion''" — Patrick H. Wynne and [[Christopher Gilson]]
** "''I Tyel Ehteliono ar Cosmoco''" — poem by [[Jorge Quiñónez]]
** "The New 'Narqelion'" — poem by Patrick H. Wynne

* Art: "[[:File:Parma Eldalamberon 9 page 5.png|The Wedding of Tuor and Idril]]" — art and text by Tom Loback
* Art: "[[:File:Aiya Earendil Elenion Ancalima!.png|''Aiya Earendil Elenion Ancalima!'']]" — Adam Christensen
* Runes: Letters to ''Parma''
* Back cover: "[[:File:Parma Eldalamberon 9 (back cover).png|Alqalindele]]" — calligraphy by Christopher Gilson, art by Adam Christensen

==External links==
* [http://www.eldalamberon.com/parma9.html Official product] on Eldalamberon.com (currently unavailable)
